Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to selections for beverages included in children’s meals

Items.Title: A Local Law in relation to requiring the department of health and mental hygiene to report on the occurrence of diabetes and diabetes-related health problems and develop a plan to reduce diabetes-related health problems

Items.MatterName: Requiring the dept of health and mental hygiene to report on the occurrence of diabetes and diabetes-related health problems and develop a plan to reduce diabetes-related health problems.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring public information messaging on healthy eating.
